name: Obsidian Plain
description: A field of volcanic glass provides valuable material for tools and weapons, but the sharp edges can cause severe injuries. The obsidian can be traded for high value, while the glass-like surface can create dangerous footing and disorienting reflections.
atmosphere: Field of volcanic glass creating world of sharp edges and valuable materials. Air scented of volcanic minerals. Sharp edges cause severe injuries. Glass-like surface creates dangerous footing and disorienting reflections. Volcanic nature creates raw, untamed natural power feeling.
